```{r}
library(sf)
 
## simulate data
set.seed(1232)
n 	<- 100
loc 	<- cbind(runif(n,0,1), runif(n,0,1))  # n linhas com duas colunas lon, lat
```


```{r}
hdist = function(locMatrix) {
  ptsVec <- list() 
  for (i in 1:n) {
      ptsVec[[i]] <- st_point(c(locMatrix[i, 1], locMatrix[i, 2]))  
    }

    # 2. fazer uma matriz de distÃ¢ncia(i, j)
    distMatrix <- matrix(0, nrow = n, ncol = n)

    for (i in 1:n) {
      for (j in 1:n) {
      distMatrix[i, j] <- st_distance(ptsVec[[i]], ptsVec[[j]], which = "Hausdorff")
      }
  }

  return(distMatrix)
}
```
